title: The Clippers execution, or, Treason justly rewarded manifested in the fearful example of two women who were notorious offenders, and tryed at the Old-Bayly the 13th of this present April, 1678, for clipping and defacing His Majesties coyn ... : to the tune of In summer time.
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright and J. Clarke,
